search.name: web_search
search.description: Search on the web and return formatted results. If failure, fallback to `deep_search` using 'standard' depth.

fetch_content.name: fetch_url
fetch_content.description: Fetch and parse content from a webpage URL always starting with https://

brave_web_search.name: news_search
brave_web_search.description: Search news on the web using Brave Search, ideal for news and articles. Use this for broad information gathering and recent events. Always add 'news' keyword if missing. Only call this tool if the request is news-related.

linkup-search.name: deep_search
linkup-search.description: Deep search on the web using Linkup. Always use 'deep' depth by default. Returns comprehensive content from the most relevant sources. Only call this tool if `deep search` is explicitely requested by the user.

get_page_content.name: fetch_grokipedia_page
get_page_content.description: Get article content from a wiki page

post_Library_Refresh.name: refresh_media_library
post_Library_Refresh.description: Refresh media library and return no response body.
